name: Related Purchase Order Number
title: RPON
definition: Identifies the PON of a related Access Service Request.
usageNotes: Required when the associated UREF field is populated and the associated RUID and the associated AUNT fields are not populated.
Prohibited when the associated AUNT field is populated.
fieldNotes: The RPON specified in this field identifies the PON which is establishing the physical connection (UNI) for this end of the EVC.
